publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2873 Linda Fabiani: Women's Welfare in Afghanistan—That the Parliament supports the call of the European Free Alliance Women’s Network, made in Barcelona on International Women’s Day, 8 March 2002, for regional Parliaments and Assemblies, European Community Member States’ Parliaments, the European Parliament and the United Nations to address the problem of funding the Ministry of Women’s Affairs in Afghanistan which is absolutely necessary to ensure that women’s welfare is not forgotten in Afghanistan in the future. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*, Andrew Wilson*, Colin Campbell*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Tricia Marwick*, Michael Matheson*, Fiona McLeod*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2873 Women's Welfare in Afghanistan (lodged on 8 March 2002) Shona Robison*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-2873 Women's Welfare in Afghanistan (lodged on 8 March 2002) Tommy Sheridan*, Elaine Smith*
S1M-2873 Women's Welfare in Afghanistan (lodged on 8 March 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2873 Women's Welfare in Afghanistan (lodged on 8 March 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-2873 Women's Welfare in Afghanistan (lodged on 8 March 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2873 Women's Welfare in Afghanistan (lodged on 8 March 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-2873 Women's Welfare in Afghanistan (lodged on 8 March 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
